SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Managers

Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Managers.AudioManager
public class AudioManager extends Object
AudioManager class manages background music and sound effects, including music volume control, fading effects and toggling audio on/off.

  • Constructor Details

    • AudioManager

      public AudioManager(AudioAssetLoader audioAssetLoader)
      Constructs AudioManager instance with AudioAssetLoader. Initialises preferences, music volume settings and sound effects cache.
      Parameters:
      audioAssetLoader - : AudioAssetLoader used to load audio assets.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AudioManager getInstance(AudioAssetLoader audioAssetLoader)
      Returns singleton instance of AudioManager. It creates one if instance does not exist.
      Parameters:
      audioAssetLoader - : AudioAssetLoader used to load audio assets.
      Returns:
      Singleton instance of AudioManager.

    • playBackgroundMusic

      public void playBackgroundMusic(String audioName)
      Plays specified background music. It stops any currently playing background music, loads new background music and applies fades in effect.
      Parameters:
      audioName - : Name of audio file to play as the background music.

    • stopBackgroundMusic

      public void stopBackgroundMusic()
      Stops currently playing background music and releases the resources.

    • setBackgroundMusicVolume

      public void setBackgroundMusicVolume(double volume)
      Sets volume for background music.
      Parameters:
      volume - : Music volume level to set.

    • getBackgroundMusicVolume

      public double getBackgroundMusicVolume()
      Gets current volume of background music.
      Returns:
      Current volume level of background music.

    • toggleBackgroundMusic

      public void toggleBackgroundMusic(boolean isOn)
      Toggles background music on/off. If it's toggled on, it resumes playback with previous volume set. If it's toggled off, it pauses playback and mutes the volume.
      Parameters:
      isOn - : True to turn on background music, false to turn it off.

    • fadeIn

      private void fadeIn(javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer player)
      Fades in effect for specified MediaPlayer by gradually increasing the volume when player enters the scene.
      Parameters:
      player - : MediaPlayer to fade in.

    • fadeOut

      public void fadeOut(javafx.util.Duration fadeDuration)
      Fades out effect for currently playing background music over a specified duration.
      Parameters:
      fadeDuration - : The duration over which to fade out background music.

    • pauseBackgroundMusic

      public void pauseBackgroundMusic()
      Pauses currently playing background music.

    • resumeBackgroundMusic

      public void resumeBackgroundMusic()
      Resumes currently paused background music.

    • playSoundEffect

      public void playSoundEffect(String audioName)
      Plays sound effect with specified audioName. If sound effects settings are toggled off, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      audioName - : Name of audio file to play as sound effect.

    • setSoundEffectsVolume

      public void setSoundEffectsVolume(double volume)
      Sets volume levels for sound effects.
      Parameters:
      volume - : Volume level to set.

    • preloadSoundEffect

      public void preloadSoundEffect(String audioName)
      Preloads sound effect into cache in order to reduce latency when it's played later.
      Parameters:
      audioName - : Name of audio file to preload.

    • getSoundEffectsVolume

      public double getSoundEffectsVolume()
      Gets current volume of sound effects.
      Returns:
      Current volume level of sound effects.

    • toggleSoundEffects

      public void toggleSoundEffects(boolean isOn)
      Toggles sound effects on/off. If toggled on, restores previous volume set. If toggled off, it mutes the volume.
      Parameters:
      isOn - : True to turn on sound effects, false to turn it off.
